question: Which Union Ministry has released a set of guidelines named ‘PRAGYATA’?
option2: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers welfare
option4: Ministry of Health and Family welfare
explanation:
Union Human Resource Development Minister Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank has recently released a set of guidelines on Digital Education through online medium.
It is named ‘PRAGYATA’, which includes eight steps of digital learning namely Plan- Review- Arrange- Guide- Yak(talk)- Assign- Track- Appreciate. It aimed at addressing teachers, parents, and students on coping with stress during digital learning and recommended screen time for children.
